responses.rationale: The segment provides factual corrections to numbers of birds killed. It contains no intensifiers or comparative adjectives modifying risk-adjectives.
The segment reports factual information about virus spread and case numbers. It contains no intensifiers or comparative adjectives modifying risk-adjectives.
The segment reports a factual finding about milk samples. It contains no intensifiers or comparative adjectives modifying risk-adjectives.
The segment reports factual actions taken by authorities. It contains no intensifiers or comparative adjectives modifying risk-adjectives.
